name: Scalev
description: Scalev is an all-in-one platform for Indonesian entrepreneurs, offering a no-code landing page builder, payment gateway, and LMS. It features Scalev Chat, which provides a simple, web-based integration with WhatsApp Business API clients. This new capability allows businesses to easily automate marketing messages, order confirmations, and customer follow-ups directly via WhatsApp, streamlining communication and boosting sales efficiency.
